text: V is an American fashion magazine. They began publishing in 1999. The magazine is printed seasonally and focuses trends in fashion, movies, music and art. V is edited by Stephen Gan. V has been known for its progressive styling, as well as its reportage of cultural figures. People who wrote for the magazine include Inez van Lamsweerde and Vinoodh Matadin, Hedi Slimane, Mario Testino, Mario Sorrenti, and Karl Lagerfeld. Interview subjects have included Joan Didion, Salman Rushdie, Robert Altman, Brooke Shields, and Norman Mailer. ==References== Category:Magazines published in New York City
title: V (American magazine)
